fullText: Under the skilled direction of Ruben Santiago-Hudson, Jitney is a masterpiece of ensemble acting that brings August Wilson's vivid characters to vibrant life.
dtliExcerpt: Under the skilled direction of Ruben Santiago-Hudson, Jitney is a masterpiece of ensemble acting that brings August Wilson's vivid characters to vibrant life.
